name: EndscreenTweaks
description: Various tweaks to the endscreen. (Formerly WholesomeEndTexts.)

endTexts.name: Enable Endscreen Texts
endTexts.description: Toggles the main feature of the mod: changing the endscreen text!

custom.name: Include Custom Messages
custom.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes your own custom "Level Complete" text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory (look for the golden pencil button at the bottom left of the mod's introductory screen).

technoblade.name: Include Technoblade (o7)
technoblade.description:
<cp>[REQUIRES RESTART TO APPLY]</c>

Includes quotes from Minecraft YouTuber Technoblade.

maxScale.name: End Text Max Scale
maxScale.description: Sets the max scale of all end text messages.

platAttemptsAndJumps.name: Plat. Attempts + Jumps
platAttemptsAndJumps.description: Shows your attempt and jump count on the Level Complete screen when completing Platformer levels.

hideHideEndscreen.name: Hide "Hide Endscreen" Button
hideHideEndscreen.description:
Hides the "Hide Endscreen" button from EndLevelLayer. (Still clickable, just invisible.)

<cy>(Enabling this option will also hide the sprite of the extra button added from enabling the "Hide EndLevelLayer" option.)</c>

hideEndLevelLayer.name: Hide EndLevelLayer
hideEndLevelLayer.description: Hides the EndLevelLayer, and adds an extra button to toggle the EndLevelLayer's visibility.

noTransition.name: No Transition
noTransition.description: Disables the bouncing transition when showing EndLevelLayer.
